name: fulldeck
description: Full-stack gaming platform with React frontend and Node.js backend

scripts.startlocal: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd .. && concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run web -- --port 3000"
scripts.install-all: npm install && npm install --workspace=frontend && npm install --workspace=backend
scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=frontend && npm run build --workspace=backend
